description:
If you don’t like carrying an extra key but you still want the protection of a U-lock, this is your lock. The Combo lock is a full size U-lock, so it is easy to loop around frames, rear wheels, and whatever you want to secure your bike to. The tried-and-true combination lock system is easy to use, and you can even register your combination with Kryptonite for free – a nice little bit of insurance should you forget your combo.

  • 4-digit resettable combination
  • 12mm hardened shackle
  • “Bent foot” shackle design is quick and easy to use
  • Side-mount snap-in bracket provides mounting options
  • Vinyl coating protects your bike’s paint
  • Anti-rattle bumpers reduce noise while riding on rough surfaces
  • Dustcover keeps road grit out of the combination area
  • Kryptonite rates this U-lock 6/10 for security
name: Kryptonite Kryptolok Combination U-Lock
